channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: RuneScape: Paths to Adventure - The Return
item.description: Equip yourself for your RuneScape journey
item.content:encoded:
Gear up for adventure in the legendary high-fantasy open world MMORPG RuneScape! Our epic, popular bundle returns with a 1-month membership granting access to additional content and features, along with a treasure vault full of Keys, Umbral Chests, RuneCoins, cosmetics, and more to enhance your journey. Explore the land of Gielinor and get ready for the upcoming Necromancy update on August 7, and help support Gameheads and Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund with your purchase!

Buyers who already own cosmetic items will not receive duplicates.

Restrictions:
Bundle purchase grants single key that will redeem all items on one Runescape account. Limit one key redemption per account.

Ironman restrictions apply to this bundle. Ironman accounts are ineligible to redeem this bundle.

Accounts with an active RuneScape Mobile Subscription will not be able to redeem this code for membership or the items.

Accounts with two and a half years or more of membership stacked will not be able to redeem.

item.title: RPG Legends: Baldur's Gate & Beyond
item.content:encoded:
Lose yourself in some of the most immersive, beloved, legendary PC role-playing experiences of all time—and get Lose yourself in some of the most immersive, beloved, legendary PC role-playing experiences of all time! Rediscover a genre-defining saga in the Enhanced Editions of Baldur’s Gate and Baldur’s Gate II from Beamdog. Embark on an epic journey in 2021’s acclaimed Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous. Return to the Forgotten Realms in Neverwinter Nights: Complete Adventures and more, and help support Active Minds with your purchase!

Active Minds is grateful for Humble Bundle's support of our organization's important mental health mission. Active Minds was not involved in the selection of the books in this promotion and does not necessarily endorse those books or agree with the advice or ideas expressed in them.

item.title: Myst & More Redux: 30 Years of Myst
item.description: Celebrate 30 years of wonder with Myst
item.content:encoded:
Discover three decades of breathtaking adventure with this era-spanning Myst bundle from the studio that started it all!

Return to where everything began with the 2021 remake of the original Myst on PC or in VR, more stunning than ever thanks to the Unreal Engine. Venture further into its wondrous worlds in the critically acclaimed sequels Riven and Myst III: Exile. Experience an original, mind-bending sci-fi adventure in Obduction, with full VR support. Add a critical chapter of gaming history to your library and support Active Minds with your purchase!

Active Minds is grateful for Humble Bundle's support of our organization's important mental health mission. Active Minds was not involved in the selection of the games in this promotion and does not necessarily endorse those games or agree with the advice or ideas expressed in them.

item.title: Whimsy & Wonder: A Cozy Games Collection
item.description: Explore the cozy side of gaming
item.content:encoded: Invite some whimsy into your gaming life with this collection of wholesome and cozy games. Revitalize the family business, manage adorable felines, and cultivate a quirky patronage in Cat Cafe Manager. Learn to take it slow and explore gorgeous low-poly landscapes in the indie hit A Short Hike. Juggle the daily demands of a cottage occult practice while navigating knotty relationships and a demanding clientele in Witch Life Story. Pay what you want for these games and more, and help the ACLU and Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!

item.title: At-Home Arcade
item.content:encoded: Game to your heart’s content without dropping a fortune in pocket change with our At-Home Arcade bundle! Brutalize your opponents (and finish them with Fatalities for good measure) in the smash-hit fighter Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate Edition. Clean up the mean streets in the name of love in River City Girls. Reduce your race rivals to piles of flaming wreckage in Trail Out. Go on a gaming rampage, and support the Raiden Science Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Cyberpunk Playground
item.content:encoded: In the mood for cybernetically enhanced action and intrigue and taking on some megacorps? Tool up and jack in with this game bundle full of vibrant and gritty cyberpunk hits! Explore a stunning pixelated metropolis with a supernatural twist in ANNO: Mutationem. Experience award-winning white knuckle first-person action set in harrowing dystopia in Ghostrunner. Uncover the beating heart of a stark megacity from the perspective of a cyberpunk courier in Cloudpunk. Pay what you want and support buildOn with your purchase!
